item.title: SLB
item.description: score:141 Chances: The average brokerage recommendation for Schlumberger (SLB) is equivalent to a Buy, indicating positive sentiment among analysts. According to recent Q4 2023 results, companies beat market expectations, suggesting a solid outlook for corporate earnings and potential upside for SLB. Elite blue-chip stocks like SLB can provide downside protection and substantial upside amid geopolitical and macroeconomic uncertainties in 2024.
